title: Muscle beach
creator_credit: Strick Film Company, J Strick and I Lerner
brief_description: A humorous and poetic impression of the pursuit of physical culture on the San Monica Beach, California. The languor’s of a summer afternoon are contrasted satirically with the fervours of the body builders and devotees of physical exercise.
creator_credit_for_label: Strick Film Company, J Strick and I Lerner
